name: DenhipHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn on the plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your Denhip Home products, such as: lights, plugs, etc. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
(1) Download our “Denhip Home” app in app market then register an account;
(2) Configure our devices in our “Denhip Home” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
(3) Enable “Denhip Home" skill on Alexa app, and you'll be navigated to "Denhip Home" login page;
(4) Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
(5) Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, turn on the plug."
"Alexa, turn off the plug."
